    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Player other)
      Player comparison is based on their characterCard's rank (natural ordering of integer). Note : this class has a natural ordering that is inconsistent with equals.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Player>
      Parameters:
      other - the other player to be compared.
      Returns:
      a positive value if this rank is greater than other rank. 0 if there is a tie. a negative value if other rank is greater than this rank.
